description:
Her skills allow you to mark and heal teammates, as well as do enormous burst damage. You'll want to use boosting her damage utilizing her mark to keep her topped up and give her more damage against the enemy for the full damage player.

If you wish to utilize her as a support, you'll want to regularly proc her heals as well as her artifact passives to keep your carries doing as much damage as possible.
title: Qiqi | Playstyle
